aws_pinpoint_email_channel.description: Provides a Pinpoint Email Channel resource.

enabled.description: Whether the channel is enabled or disabled. Defaults to `true`.

from_address.description: The email address used to send emails from.

identity.description: The ARN of an identity verified with SES.

role_arn.description: The ARN of an IAM Role used to submit events to Mobile Analytics' event ingestion service.

messages_per_second.description: Messages per second that can be sent.
